Articles.Content: So I stated making YouTube videos of me playing Kerbal space program, and I was amazed when I got this! I just made my fourth video and I got a comment from one of my idols heretic391! Thank you sir! My YouTube is here! (sorry if in wrong section!) Cheers and enjoy!

lucky you, most comments like that are ussually an ad for "Subscribers" for you to buy.

I perfer to livestream though then post on youtube. Makes for more user interaction.
